mutants.code:
def max_split_average_sum(arr, n):
    """"""
    arr.sort()
    a1 = sum(arr[:n - 1]) / (n - 1) + arr[n - 1]
    return a1

def max_split_average_sum(arr, n):
    """
    Calculate the maximum value of f(a) + f(b) where f(x) is the average of the subsequence x.

    Parameters:
    arr (list of int): The array of integers.
    n (int): The size of the array.

    Returns:
    float: The maximum value of f(a) + f(b).
    """
    arr.sort()
    a1 = sum(arr[:n - 1]) / (n - 1) - arr[n - 1]
    return a1

def max_split_average_sum(arr, n):
    """
    Calculate the maximum value of f(a) + f(b) where f(x) is the average of the subsequence x.

    Parameters:
    arr (list of int): The array of integers.
    n (int): The size of the array.

    Returns:
    float: The maximum value of f(a) + f(b).
    """
    arr.sort()
    a1 = sum(arr[:n - 1]) / (n - 1) * arr[n - 1]
    return a1

    """
    Calculate the maximum value of f(a) + f(b) where f(x) is the average of the subsequence x.

    n (int): The size of the array.

    Returns:
    float: The maximum value of f(a) + f(b).
    """
    arr.sort()
